title: CraftingStation
description: Defines a world or deployable station that enables crafting via specific skills and recipe output classes.

key.description: Stable internal identifier for the crafting station. Lowercase snake_case, not player-facing.

display_name.description: Player-facing name of the crafting station.

description.description: Optional player-facing description of the crafting station.

allowed_crafting_skills.description: List of crafting skills permitted to use this station.

allowed_output_classes.description: Recipe output classes that this station can execute.

station_characteristics.description: High-level characteristics describing how the station exists and is used.

permanent.description: Whether the station is permanent rather than temporary.

world_placed.description: Whether the station exists as a world-placed object rather than a player-deployed construct.

shared_use.description: Whether the station supports shared use by multiple players.
